00032 #include "egs_particle_track.h"
00033 
00034 void EGS_ParticleTrack::grow() {
00035     // calculate the new size of the vertex array
00036     int new_size = m_size > 0 ? m_size*2 : 16;
00037     // not enough ?? then allocate more
00038     if (m_nVertices > new_size) new_size = m_nVertices;
00039     Vertex **tmp = new Vertex* [new_size];
00040     if (m_track) {
00041         for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices; ++i) {
00042             tmp[i] = m_track[i];
00043         }
00044         delete [] m_track; m_track = NULL;
00045     }
00046     m_track = tmp; m_size = new_size;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void EGS_ParticleTrack::clearTrack() {
00050     if (m_pInfo) delete m_pInfo; m_pInfo = NULL;
00051     if (m_track)
00052         for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices; i++) {
00053             if (m_track[i]) delete m_track[i]; m_track[i] = NULL;
00054         }
00055     m_nVertices = 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 int EGS_ParticleTrack::writeTrack(ofstream *trsp) {
00059     // no need to write the track if it has less than 2 vertices ...
00060     if (m_nVertices < 2) return 1;
00061     trsp->write((char *)&m_nVertices, sizeof(int));
00062     trsp->write((char *)m_pInfo, sizeof(ParticleInfo));
00063     for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices; i++) {
00064         trsp->write((char *)m_track[i],sizeof(Vertex));
00065     }
00066     return 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex* EGS_ParticleTrack::getVertex(int v) {
00070     if ((v < 0) || (v >= m_nVertices)) return NULL;
00071     return (m_track[v]);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void EGS_ParticleTrack::addVertex(Vertex *x) {
00075     m_track[m_nVertices] = x;
00076     m_nVertices++;
00077     // resize the vertex array if necessary
00078     if (m_nVertices >= m_size) grow();
00079 }
00080 
00082 
00083 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::startNewTrack() {
00084     // buffer full ? flush it
00085     if (m_nTracks >= m_bufferSize) flushBuffer();
00086     m_nTracks++;
00087 
00088     // mark the track as being scored
00089     m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::startNewTrack(int stackIndex) {
00093     if (m_nTracks >= m_bufferSize) flushBuffer();
00094     m_nTracks++;
00095 
00096     // map the track on the stack
00097     m_stackMap[stackIndex] = m_nTracks-1;
00098     m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = true;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::startNewTrack(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p) {
00102     if (m_nTracks >= m_bufferSize) flushBuffer();
00103     m_nTracks++;
00104     m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = true;
00105     m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->setParticleInfo(p);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::flushBuffer() {
00109     int save = 0;
00110     if ( m_trspFile ) {
00111         for (int i = 0; i < m_nTracks; i++) {
00112             // if the particle is not being scored anymore
00113             if (!m_isScoring[i]) {
00114                 // output it to the file and free memory
00115                 if (!m_buffer[i]->writeTrack(m_trspFile)) m_totalTracks++;
00116                 m_buffer[i]->clearTrack();
00117             } else {
00118                 // still scoring it -> save the particle
00119                 m_buffer[save] = m_buffer[i];
00120                 m_isScoring[i] = false;
00121                 m_isScoring[save] = true;
00122                 for (int idx = 0; idx < m_bufferSize; idx++) {
00123                     if (m_stackMap[idx] == i) {
00124                         m_stackMap[idx] = save;
00125                         break;
00126                     }
00127                 }
00128                 save++;
00129             }
00130         }
00131         updateHeader();
00132     }
00133     m_nTracks = save;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::updateHeader() {
00137     if (m_trspFile) {
00138         ostream::off_type pos = m_trspFile->tellp();
00139         m_trspFile->seekp(0,ios::beg);
00140         m_trspFile->write((char *) &m_totalTracks, sizeof(int));
00141         m_trspFile->seekp(pos,ios::beg);
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex* EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::getTrackVertex(int tr, int v) {
00146     if ((tr < 0) || (tr >= m_nTracks)) return NULL;
00147     return (m_buffer[tr]->getVertex(v));
00148 }
00149 
00150 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::addVertex(EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x) {
00151     if ( !m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] ) return;
00152     m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->addVertex(x);
00153 }
00154 
00155 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::addVertex(int stackIndex, EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x) {
00156     if ( !m_isScoring[m_stackMap[stackIndex]] ) return;
00157     m_buffer[m_stackMap[stackIndex]]->addVertex(x);
00158 }
00159 
00160 int EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::readDataFile(const char *filename) {
00161     const char *func_name = "EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::readDataFile()";
00162     ifstream *data = new ifstream(filename, ios::binary);
00163     if (!data || data->fail() || !data->good()) {
00164         egsWarning("%s: Unable to open track space file '%s'! No tracks loaded\n",
00165                     func_name, filename);
00166         return -1;
00167     }
00168     data->read((char *)&m_totalTracks, sizeof(int));
00169     egsInformation("%s: Reading %d tracks from '%s' ...\n", func_name, m_totalTracks, filename);
00170     m_nTracks = 0;
00171     int totalVertices = 0;
00172     m_bufferSize = m_totalTracks;
00173     m_buffer = new EGS_ParticleTrack* [m_totalTracks];
00174     m_stackMap = new int [m_totalTracks];
00175     m_isScoring = new bool [m_totalTracks];
00176     for (int i = 0; i < m_totalTracks; i++) {
00177         int nvertices;
00178         m_buffer[i] = new EGS_ParticleTrack();
00179         m_stackMap[i] = -1;
00180         m_isScoring[i] = false;
00181         EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *pinfo = new EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo(0);
00182         data->read((char *)&nvertices,sizeof(int));
00183         totalVertices += nvertices;
00184         data->read((char *)pinfo,sizeof(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo));
00185         startNewTrack(pinfo);
00186         for (int j = 0; j < nvertices; j++) {
00187             EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex* v = new EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex();
00188             data->read((char *)v,sizeof(EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex));
00189             addVertex(v);
00190         }
00191     }
00192     egsInformation("%s: Tracks in memory: %d\n", func_name, m_nTracks);
00193     egsInformation("%s: Total Vertices  : %d\n", func_name, totalVertices);
00194 
00195     return 0;
00196 }
00197 
00198 void EGS_ParticleTrackContainer::reportResults(bool with_header) {
00199     flushBuffer();
00200 
00201     // see how many tracks are still being scored
00202     int scoring = -1;
00203     if (m_isScoring) {
00204         scoring = 0;
00205         for (int i = 0; i < m_bufferSize; i++) {
00206             if (m_isScoring[i]) scoring++;
00207         }
00208     }
00209 
00210     if( with_header ) {
00211         egsInformation("\nParticle track scoring results:\n");
00212         egsInformation("=================================\n");
00213         egsInformation("   Total events scored:     %d\n", m_nEvents);
00214     }
00215     egsInformation("   Total tracks scored:     %d\n", m_totalTracks);
00216     egsInformation("   Still being scored:      ");
00217     if (scoring == -1) {
00218         egsInformation("Unknown!?\n");
00219     } else {
00220         egsInformation("%d\n", scoring);
00221         if (scoring > 0) {
00222             egsWarning("   *** There are particles still being tracked. This"
00223                        "   should never happen if this is the end of the simulation!");
00224         }
00225     }
00226     egsInformation("   Output file name:        %s\n\n", m_trspFilename.c_str());
00227 }
